Class SpeakersIdentDb

java.lang.Object
  |

        |

              |
              +--SpeakersIdentDb
All Implemented Interfaces:
marf.Storage.IDatabase, marf.Storage.IStorageManager, java.io.Serializable
public class SpeakersIdentDb
extends marf.Storage.Database

Class SpeakersIdentDb manages database of speakers on the application level.

XXX: Move stats collection over to MARF.
